content: I'm still working on creating detailed records for the creatures in the Ecoglobe, figuring out how to improve their living conditions... Please stay tuned for my updates!
info: 墨尔斯万象馆建馆捐献_主流程文本2

content: It also took me a while to get the hang of the shellfish tongs. New tools do require some time to get familiar with. No worries, let me show you how to use it again!
info: 墨尔斯万象馆建馆捐献_主流程文本2

content:
<color=#8AAB4B>{最近捐赠物}</color>!
The specimens you've worked hard to find,
I'll ensure they're properly cared for and documented.
info: 墨尔斯万象馆建馆捐献_主流程文本2
墨尔斯万象馆建馆捐献_主流程文本2

content: So, do you have any new creatures for me to take care of? I'd really appreciate it if you do!
info: 墨尔斯万象馆建馆捐献_主流程文本2

content: Each shore-dweller has its own behavior, so you'll need to use the <color=#38b6c5>left mouse button</color> flexibly and keep an eye on the distance to your target.
info: 墨尔斯万象馆建馆捐献_主流程文本2

content:
That's how you use the shellfish tongs.
If you ever forget, don't hesitate to ask.
I'll always be here to help!
info: 墨尔斯万象馆建馆捐献_主流程文本2

content:
From a population dynamics perspective,
and considering the holistic ecosystem design...
We still need <color=#8AAB4B>{剩余捐赠数量}</color> more species!
info: 墨尔斯万象馆建馆捐献_主流程文本2

content: I forgot how to use the shellfish tongs.
info: 墨尔斯万象馆建馆捐献_主流程文本2

content: In the shallow beach area, aim at the creature, <color=#38b6c5>hold</color> the <color=#38b6c5>left</color> mouse button, slowly approach it, and release the button to catch it quickly.
info: 墨尔斯万象馆建馆捐献_主流程文本2
墨尔斯万象馆建馆捐献_主流程文本2

content: I'm so happy to hear that! What kind of creature is it this time?
info: 墨尔斯万象馆建馆捐献_主流程文本2

content:
<color=#d3b037>{me}</color>, you're here!
I was just thinking about the ecosystem in the sphere and wondering how you're doing.
